titleStmt.title: A True and perfect relation of a great and bloudy battell fought the 23 of October old stile being the same day, upon which was fought the battell betwixt the King and the Lord Generall Earle of Essex neare Kynton, betwixt the emperours army and the command of his brother Arch-Duke Leopold William and Generall Piccolomini on one side, and the Swedish army under the command of Generall Torstensohn on the other side : being the copie sent by the Swedish general Major Coningsmarck from the campe before Leipzik, the 24 of October old stile, to the Count of Elerstein lieutenant generall of the landgrave of Heffens forces.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
